tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE cloud_data_replication (
    id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    region_name VARCHAR(50),
    data_center VARCHAR(50),
    last_sync TIMESTAMP
)

CREATE TABLE data_replication (
  replication_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  replication_type VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL,
  replication_frequency INT NOT NULL,
  region_id INT NOT NULL,
  FOREIGN KEY (region_id) REFERENCES cloud_regions(region_id)
);

CREATE TABLE cloud_data_center (
    id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
    data_center_name VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL,
    data_center_location VARCHAR(100) NOT NULL,
    region_id INT NOT NULL,
    FOREIGN KEY (region_id) REFERENCES region_data(id)
);

CREATE TABLE data_replication_logs (
    log_id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
    operation_type VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL,
    operation_time TIMESTAMP NOT NULL,
    data_center_id INT NOT NULL,
    FOREIGN KEY (data_center_id) REFERENCES cloud_data_center(id)
);
